org.springframework.context

类 PayloadApplicationEvent<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.EventObject
      • org.springframework.context.ApplicationEvent
        • org.springframework.context.PayloadApplicationEvent<T>
  • 类型参数:
    T - the payload type of the event
    所有已实现的接口:
    Serializable, org.springframework.core.ResolvableTypeProvider

    public class PayloadApplicationEvent<T>
extends ApplicationEvent
implements org.springframework.core.ResolvableTypeProvider
    An ApplicationEvent that carries an arbitrary payload.

    Mainly intended for internal use within the framework.

    从以下版本开始:
    4.2
    作者:
    Stephane Nicoll
    另请参阅:

      • PayloadApplicationEvent

        public PayloadApplicationEvent(Object source,
                               T payload)
        Create a new PayloadApplicationEvent.
        参数:
        source - the object on which the event initially occurred (never null)
        payload - the payload object (never null)
